General.Name: Yibin Tianyuan Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Yibin Tianyuan Group Co., Ltd. produces and distributes chlor-alkali chemicals in China and internationally. Its products include organic and inorganic chemical products. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Yibin, China.
General.Address: 61 West Section of Gangyuan Road, Yibin, China, 644000

4.Name: Mr. Bo  He
4.Title: Director, VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
